name: Virtual CD 8 Disc Image
summary: Learn about .VC8 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: While VC8 files are specific to Virtual CD 8, Virtual CD's .VC4 format is compatible with Virtual CD 4 and higher.

description: Disc image created by Virtual CD 8 disc authoring software; specific to version 8 of the software and stores disc data; enables the raw contents of a disc to be stored as an exact copy on the hard disk.
